basic.description:
Intensive coverage of topics that are current and/or of special interest in the area of epidemiology. Offered periodically by visiting professors or members of faculty. Students should check with the School regarding availability of this course.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Advanced Studies in Epidemiology

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    [Level 4 and registration in a (Major or Medial HLTH Plan) or PHED Specialization Plan or KINE Specialization Plan] and HLTH 323/3.0.
